legal.privacyPolicyIntro: Learn about how we handle your personal data and your rights under global privacy regulations including GDPR and CCPA.
legal.termsIntro: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.
legal.accessibilityIntro: Our commitment to providing an inclusive and barrier-free learning experience for every student and professional using the Skill-Learn platform.
legal.complianceIntro: Skill-Learn utilizes defense-in-depth security strategies, AES-256 encryption, and global compliance standards to ensure your workforce data remains private and secure.
legal.stayUpdatedLegal: Stay updated with our latest legal developments.
legal.noteToEuropeanUsersDesc: Our operations are fully GDPR compliant. You have specific rights regarding your data portability and the right to be forgotten.
legal.contactDpoDescription: Contact our Data Protection Officer for detailed inquiries.
legal.introP1: Welcome to Skill-Learn. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website (regardless of where you visit it from) and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
legal.introP2: This website is not intended for children and we do not knowingly collect data relating to children. It is important that you read this privacy policy together with any other privacy policy or fair processing policy we may provide on specific occasions when we are collecting or processing personal data about you.
legal.dataCollectionP1: Personal data, or personal information, means any information about an individual from which that person can be identified. We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:
legal.identityDataDesc: includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.
legal.contactDataDesc: includes billing address, delivery address, email address and telephone numbers.
legal.technicalDataDesc: includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version.
legal.usageDataDesc: includes information about how you use our website, products and services.
legal.howWeCollectDataP: We use different methods to collect data from and about you including through direct interactions (filling in forms), automated technologies (cookies and server logs), and third parties or publicly available sources.
legal.usageRightsP1: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
legal.usageRightsL1: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you.
legal.usageRightsL2: Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.
legal.usageRightsL3: Where we need to comply with a legal or regulatory obligation.
legal.actionRequiredP: If you do not agree with our data usage rights, you must discontinue the use of our platform immediately to avoid automated data tracking.
legal.dataSecurityP1: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.
legal.dataSecurityP2: We have put in place procedures to deal with any suspected personal data breach and will notify you and any applicable regulator of a breach where we are legally required to do so.
legal.cookiePolicyP1: Our website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our site.
legal.contactUsP1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact our data privacy manager in the following ways:

footer.copyright: Copyright Â© 2025 - All rights reserved by Skill-Learn.ca

about.heroSubtitle: We empower the future of learning with AI-driven insights and personalized growth paths. Our mission is to make skill development accessible, engaging, and impactful for everyone.
about.humanFirstDesc: Every solution we build starts with the people who will use it.
about.humanizingTechParagraph: Skill-Learn was born from a simple realization: the future isn't about machines replacing humans, but about machines empowering them. We create exceptional workplaces where people are the primary asset.
about.guidingLightSubtitle: These values aren't just posters on a wall. They are the heartbeat of everything we create.
about.seasonedExpertiseDesc: Deep industry knowledge meets fresh perspective. We don't just follow trends; we define them.
about.efficiencyUnleashedDesc: We optimize your human capital investment by removing friction and focusing on high-impact growth strategies.
about.tailoredSolutionsDesc: Your organization is unique. Your learning ecosystem should be too. We build for your specific DNA.
about.ourCultureDesc: At Skill-Learn, we believe that the best work happens when people feel empowered, inspired, and supported. We're building a space where creativity meets technology.
about.peopleFirstDesc: We nurture talent and value every voice in our community.
about.fastIterationDesc: We move quickly, learn from mistakes, and scale what works.
about.workLifeHarmonyDesc: We optimize for focus and results, not hours at the desk.
about.ctaSubtitle: We are looking for dreamers, builders, and disruptors who are ready to redefine how talent is developed in the AI era.

features.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to train your team, track performance, and scale your organization's knowledge base in one intuitive platform.
features.gamificationDesc: Boost employee engagement with immersive learning mechanics. Our platform transforms repetitive training into an achievement-driven experience that teams actually enjoy.
features.gamificationH1Sub: Reward milestones with custom digital badges.
features.gamificationH2Sub: Drive healthy competition with department rankings.
features.gamificationH3Sub: Earn points for course completion and unlock rewards.
features.quizBuilderDesc: Create comprehensive assessments in minutes, not hours. Our drag-and-drop interface makes evaluation simple, effective, and visually engaging for learners.
features.quizBuilderH1Sub: Build quizzes without any technical knowledge.
features.quizBuilderH2Sub: Provide immediate results and explanations to learners.
features.quizBuilderH3Sub: Automatically generate questions from your course content.
features.analyticsDesc: Make data-driven decisions with deep insights into learner performance and ROI tracking. Understand your team's skill landscape like never before.
features.analyticsH1Sub: Monitor completion rates as they happen across global teams.
features.analyticsH2Sub: Identify where your workforce needs more training.
features.analyticsH3Sub: Export tailored reports for stakeholders with one click.
features.caseStudyQuote: The transition to Skill-Learn was the single most impactful decision we made for our L&D strategy. The automated gamification features didn't just teach our employees; it excited them about learning.
features.challengeText: Fragmented learning tools led to low completion rates and zero ROI visibility.
features.solutionText: Centralized LMS with Skill-Learn's Enterprise Analytics and AI career pathways.
features.readyToTransform: Ready to transform your corporate training?
features.joinOver500: Join over 500+ forward-thinking companies scaling their knowledge with Skill-Learn.
features.noCreditCard: No credit card required. 14-day free trial.

pricing.forSmallTeams: Perfect for small teams getting started with learning management
pricing.forGrowingOrgs: For growing organizations that need more power and flexibility
pricing.forEnterprise: For large organizations requiring enterprise-grade features
pricing.choosePlan: Choose the plan that best fits your needs. No hidden fees.
pricing.heroDescription: Choose the perfect plan for your organization. Start free, upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees, no surprises.
pricing.compareDescription: Not sure which plan is right for you? Compare all features side by side.
pricing.faqDescription: Got questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
pricing.faq1Question: Can I try before I buy?
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes! Our Pro plan comes with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. You can also start with our Free plan and upgrade anytime.
pricing.faq2Question: What happens when I exceed my user limit?
pricing.faq2Answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can upgrade your plan at any time to accommodate more users. We won't lock you out suddenly.
pricing.faq3Answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll have immediate access to new features. When downgrading, changes take effect at your next billing cycle.
pricing.faq4Question: Is there a discount for annual billing?
pricing.faq4Answer: Yes! When you choose annual billing, you save approximately 17% compared to monthly billing. That's like getting 2 months free!
pricing.faq5Question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits or education?
pricing.faq5Answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for non-profit organizations and educational institutions. Contact our sales team to learn more about our discount programs.
pricing.faq6Question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq6Answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and for Enterprise customers, we also support invoicing and wire transfers.
pricing.faq7Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. We don't believe in lock-in contracts.
pricing.faq8Answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR. Enterprise plans include additional security features like SSO and SOC 2 compliance.
pricing.joinThousands: Join thousands of organizations using Skill-Learn to engage, train, and grow their teams.
pricing.noCreditCardRequired: No credit card required â€¢ 14-day free trial â€¢ Cancel anytime
pricing.allPricesUsd: All prices are in USD. Taxes may apply based on your location.

pricing.enterpriseRequiresQuote: Enterprise plan requires a custom quote. Please contact sales.

faq.howCanWeHelp: How can we help you today?
faq.searchKnowledgeBase: Search our knowledge base for answers to common questions about the Skill-Learn platform.
faq.tryDifferent: Try a different search term or browse categories above.
faq.cantFindLookingFor: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is here to help.
faq.supportExpertsAvailable: Our support experts are available 24/7 to help you with any questions or technical issues.
faq.platformQ1: How do I create my first course?
faq.platformA1: To create your first course, navigate to the 'Instructor Dashboard' and click on the '+ New Course' button. You can then use our drag-and-drop builder to add modules, quizzes, and multimedia content. Detailed tutorials are available in our 'Learning Center' category.
faq.platformQ2: Can I white-label the student interface?
faq.platformA2: Yes! Skill-Learn offers extensive white-labeling options for Enterprise customers. You can customize the domain, brand colors, logo, and even the email templates sent to your students.
faq.platformQ3: What file types are supported for uploads?
faq.platformA3: We support a wide range of file types including MP4 for videos, PDF for documents, ZIP for SCORM packages, and all major image formats (JPG, PNG, SVG). Maximum file size depends on your subscription plan.
faq.billingQ1: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.billingA1: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for larger enterprise accounts. For annual billing, we also support invoicing with Net-30 terms.
faq.billingQ2: Can I change my plan at any time?
faq.billingA2: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your billing settings. Upgrades take effect immediately on a prorated basis, while downgrades take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.techA1: Yes, we support Single Sign-On (SSO) via SAML 2.0, Okta, and Microsoft Azure AD for Enterprise plans. This allows your team to log in using their existing corporate credentials securely.

sitemap.subtitle: An organized directory of all available pages and resources within the Skill-Learn platform.
